timeline.message:
Fault Tolerance 3.0 metrics changes

Alter the MetricRecorder interface to accommodate the new metrics added
in 3.0.

Implement MetricRecorder for the FT 3.0 metrics.

Alter the MetricRecorder interface to accommodate the new metrics added
in 3.0.

Implement MetricRecorder for the FT 3.0 metrics.

timeline.bodyText: This class is kinda hard to read in a github diff ... do you think it needs more doc?
timeline.author: tevans78

timeline.bodyText: Should this package be com.ibm.ws.microprofile.faulttolerance30.metrics.integration to avoid an future clashes?
timeline.author: tevans78

replies.bodyText: Hopefully not, I haven't seen the issue occur on the latest OpenJ9. Once we're happy it's not happening any more, we should go through and remove it from all the test projects.
replies.author: Azquelt
